Dating: 1ST INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Model of a bakery and a brewery
Description: This model in wood represents a bakery and a brewery scene. One distinguishes several people: a woman who mills the grain, another who kneads, a man who carries the wood for the cooking, another who mixes the beer, a scribe, who establishes the inventory, and a supervisor equipped with a staff.
